name: Combatting PsyOps in Healthcare
description: Counteracting psychological warfare used to manipulate medical decisions, suppress real cures, and enforce harmful treatments.

cards.title: Exposing the Illusion of Scientific Consensus
cards.description: Identifying how the perception of scientific agreement is artificially engineered.
cards.bulletpoints: Controlled expert panels, selective peer review, silencing of dissenting voices

cards.title: Coercion Tactics in Public Health Policies
cards.description: Understanding how fear and social pressure are used to enforce medical compliance.
cards.bulletpoints: Mandates vs. informed consent, social ostracization, crisis exploitation

cards.title: Breaking the Cycle of Institutional Trust Abuse
cards.description: Revealing how global institutions are weaponized to maintain medical control structures.
cards.bulletpoints: NGOs & foundations as soft power tools, regulatory capture, historical case studies
